node.title: Police search Marilyn Manson's home as part of sexual assault, domestic violence probe
node.alt: Musician Marilyn Manson is wearing dark eye makeup and lipstick and a black leather coat
node.description: Los Angeles police say they seized media storage devices and other items from the home of the musician, who has been accused of abuse by several women.
node.content:
["Police have seized media storage devices and other items at rocker Marilyn Manson's home as part of a months-long investigation of sexual assault and domestic violence allegations.", "Manson, 52, whose legal name is Brian Hugh Warner, was not at the Hollywood home when investigators searched it early on Monday morning, the Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department said in a statement.", "The Sheriff's Department began investigating Manson early this year\u00a0following reports of sexual assault and domestic violence between 2009 and 2011 in West Hollywood, where he lived at the time.", "The women involved have\u00a0not been identified, but several women have publicly alleged this year that they were physically, sexually and emotionally abused by Manson around the time of the incidents under investigation.\u00a0Some have filed lawsuits.", "Manson's attorney Howard E\u00a0King declined to comment immediately. Manson has denied the allegations\u00a0and Mr King has called them \"provably false\".", "The search of Manson's home was first reported by TMZ.", "", "
Evan Rachel Wood has accused her former fiancee Marilyn Manson of abuse.(Jordan Strauss/Invision/AP)
", "The 52-year-old shock rocker's former fiancee, Westworld\u00a0actor Evan Rachel Wood, named him as her alleged abuser for the first time in an Instagram post in February.", "Manson called Woods's statements \"horrible distortions of reality\".", "In May, Game of Thrones\u00a0actor Esm\u00e9 Bianco sued Marilyn Manson in federal court, alleging sexual, physical and emotional abuse.", "Bianco says\u00a0Manson violated human-trafficking laws by bringing her to California from England for non-existent roles in music videos and movies.", "The lawsuit alleges Manson deprived Bianco of food and sleep, locked her in a bedroom, whipped her, gave her electric shocks and threatened to enter her room and rape her during the night.", "Bianco's lawyer\u00a0said she also was interviewed by the police.", "Manson's former assistant accused him of sexual assault, battery and harassment in her own lawsuit, saying he used \"his position of power, celebrity and connections to exploit and victimise during her employment\".", "Manson emerged as a musical star in the mid-1990s, known as much for courting public controversy as for hit songs like The Beautiful People\u00a0and hit album's like 1996's Antichrist Superstar\u00a0and 1998's Mechanical Animals.", "AP"]
